formElement.label: Script Location:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the start server script, including filename and extension. i.e: '/path/to/startManagedServer.cmd'. (Required)

formElement.label: Instance Name:
formElement.documentation: Instance name of the Managed Server to start. (Required)

formElement.label: Config Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Admin Server URL:
formElement.documentation: URL from the Admin Server (including protocol and port). (Required)

formElement.label: WLST Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST. i.e: '/path/to/wlst.cmd' or 'wlst.sh'. (Required)

formElement.label: Maximum Elapsed Time:
formElement.documentation: Defines the maximum time in seconds that the job will try to check into the server. Note that the step has a "Time Limit" property, so if this property is set to less than the parameter it will abort the step early. Blank implies no wait time (URL only checked one time).
